abstract.para: A dataset containing all occurrences available in GBIF matching the query: { "and" : [ "Country is United States of America", "DatasetKey is one of (Mohonk Preserve Forest Health Monitoring Data, iNaturalist Research-grade Observations, Mohonk Preserve Historical Observational Biodiversity Data, Entomology Division, Yale Peabody Museum, International Barcode of Life project (iBOL), Mohonk Preserve Forest Health Monitoring Data)", "Geometry POLYGON((-94 -90,180 -90,180 90,-94 90,-94 -90))", "HasCoordinate is true", "HasGeospatialIssue is false", "TaxonKey is Adelges tsugae Annand, 1924" ] } The dataset includes records from the following constituent datasets. The full metadata for each constituent is also included in this archive: 19 records from Entomology Division, Yale Peabody Museum 26 records from International Barcode of Life project (iBOL) 39 records from Mohonk Preserve Forest Health Monitoring Data 39 records from Mohonk Preserve Forest Health Monitoring Data 221 records from Mohonk Preserve Historical Observational Biodiversity Data 1932 records from iNaturalist Research-grade Observations
